data.name: Public Land Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Public Land Hunter is a retro hunting simulator that let's you hunt on procedurally generated maps with challenges that allow you to unlock weapons, perks and animals.

Procedurally Generated Maps
Each map in Public Land Hunter is procedurally generated. You'll find yourself hunting dense fall foliage, breezy summer clearings and sparse winter fields. This provides you with a unique scouting experience for each hunt, requiring analysis of the satellite map and looking for sign on the ground before setting up your ambush.

A True Deer Hunting Experience
With the procedural maps and the realistic deer AI, hunting requires strategy and an understanding of deer patterns, all of which are explained in the games tutorial.



Animal Variety
Hunt rabbits, grouse, ducks, pigs and deer, with the potential for more animals as free DLC in the future. Each animal has its own patterns and AI. Rabbits roam the fields, grouse need to be driven from the tall grass, ducks are called in, pigs roam the woods at night and deer follow realistic patterns between bedding, water and food in the early and late hours.

Speed Up Time
Public Land Hunter features the ability to fast forward time in order to keep your hunts fast and exciting. While sitting in a treestand or a hunting blind can be relaxing when in the wild, no one wants to sit for hours waiting for a deer when playing a video game. The fast forward mechanic allows you to get right to the action once you're set up for an ambush.

Quick Hunt or Career Mode
Jump right into hunting deer in quick hunt mode or work your way up to it through career mode. Career mode features an unlock system where you can complete a variety of challenges to acquire access to weapons, animals and character perks to improve your hunting experience.



Arcade Mode
Public Land Hunter also features an arcade mode, where players can experience a truly retro experience and go after high scores that will provides even more unlocks.

data.short_description: Experience the challenge of hunting public land in this retro hunting sim. Hunt a variety of game using a range of weapons on procedurally generated parcels of land. Scout, set up and shoot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
